thread.title: Oduamadi Resumes AC Milan Training, Set To Bury Late Dad
thread.title_full: Oduamadi Resumes AC Milan Training, Set To Bury Late Dad

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Oduamadi Resumes AC Milan Training, Set To Bury Late Dad
text:
Headlines / Oduamadi Resumes AC Milan Training, Set To Bury Late Dad Oduamadi Resumes AC Milan Training, Set To Bury Late Dad Headlines , Top Stories 
By Johnny Edward: 
AC Milan winger Nnamdi Oduamadi has resumed training with the Rossoneri days after his late father ‎Sir Vincent Oduamadi passed on, Completesportsnigeria.com has been informed. 
The bereaved 24-year-old Nigerian international ‎also revealed the remains of his late father will be laid to rest in Umunkwo Eziumuenyi Village in Isiala Mbano,‎ Imo State‎ on 24 October. 
"All things being equal, my late father will be laid to rest soon and I thank everybody who has been compassionate towards me," Oduamadi told Completesportsnigeria.com. 
Oduamadi also reacted to the 2-0 loss ‎the Super Eagles suffered in the hands of the Congolese on Thursday. 
He said: "The team is in transition and they will surely get better."
